text: "Treat Her Like a Lady" is a 1984 song by The Temptations and taken from their 1984 album Truly for You. It went to number 12 in the United Kingdom and number 48 in the United States and was their first success since 1975. Category:1984 songs Category:The Temptations songs
title: Treat Her Like a Lady (The Temptations song)
